thread.title: Corruption Crusader Stirs Romania to Its Knees
thread.title_full: Corruption Crusader Stirs Romania to Its Knees - WSJ

author: Drew Hinshaw
title: Corruption Crusader Stirs Romania to Its Knees
text:
BUCHAREST, Romania—Not long ago, the prosecutors at Romania’s anticorruption office rarely took on a bribery suspect bigger than a schoolteacher or a small-town cop. Often, the criminal gift was a pig, lamb or turkey.

These days, the National Anticorruption Directorate is investigating some 2,100 abuse-of-office cases, many against top politicians. Senators, parliamentarians and ministers have had to stand trial, and alleged damages...
